Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication

Interface ReplayHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReplayHandler
    public interface ReplayHandler
    This interface must be implemented for replay handlers.
    See Also:
    AbstractReplayHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String NJAMS_REPLAYED_ATTRIBUTE
      Marker attribute for replayed process instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void markAsReplayed​(Job job)
      Flags the given job instance as 'replayed'.
      ReplayResponse replay​(ReplayRequest request)
      Executes a replay.

    • Field Detail

      • NJAMS_REPLAYED_ATTRIBUTE

        static final String NJAMS_REPLAYED_ATTRIBUTE
        Marker attribute for replayed process instances. Set to true.
        Do not use directly. Instead use markAsReplayed(Job).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • markAsReplayed

        static void markAsReplayed​(Job job)
        Flags the given job instance as 'replayed'.
        Parameters:
        job - The replayed job instance to be flagged.

      • replay

        ReplayResponse replay​(ReplayRequest request)
        Executes a replay. The implementation is responsible to set the instruction's response properly.
        Parameters:
        request - ReplayRequest
        Returns:
        ReplayResponse
